name: Robot Rampage HD
description:
Grab your robot and get smashing!

Rampage through cities as a giant robot! Stomp, burn and nuke your way through randomly generated city levels! Can the military defences of the humans stop you?
How far can YOU rampage?

• Simple, intuitive control system gives you total destructive power!

• Punch, shoot and stomp your way through the city blocks!

• Carve a path of carnage through the fully destructible scenery!

• Randomly generated layouts for a different experience every play!

• Engage in all-out warfare against troops, helicopters, tanks, bombers and ballistic missiles!

• Gorgeous environments, enemies and visual effects!

• Multiple game modes:
Air Assault - How many can you destroy?
Countdown - Beat the clock!
Rampage - Destroy it all with new powerups!
Classic - Leave a trail of destruction!

• Additional content giving you two more awesome robots & environments! (IAP)

• Online high scores & achievements via GameCenter!

• Music Player access for playing your own music!

• Awesome music & sound effects by Earcom!


For a video & more info check out origin8.com/robotrampagehd

Follow us at twitter.com/origin8 & facebook.com/origin8
